name: OpenUnit
headline: Software for managing self-storage facilities.
description:
OpenUnit is the all-in-one platform self-storage facilities need to run their business - whether they’re a single mom-and-pop site or a multi-facility corporation.

Our complete set of tools gives storage operators what they need most—a powerful online presence, reservation system, legal agreements, insurance, merchant solutions and management software to simplify the process of running a storage facility.

On top of that, OpenUnit gives facilities:

   • Team Management & Communication: Every account includes a space that lets you share  messages with co-workers & head office. All without reaching for a separate app.
   • Payments & Point-of-Sale: Increase your revenue with payment options that support all card types, and increase in-store purchases with Point-of-Sale (POS) software.
   • Accounting & Bookkeeping: From sales and purchases to cashflow, taxes and reporting. OpenUnit Books will make you feel like a professional accountant, even if you aren't.

#  Everything you need to run your self-storage facilities, whether you’re big or small. 
[Get a demo — it's free  ](https://www.openunit.com/</request-info>)
Contact us to learn how OpenUnit software can work at your self-storage facilities. Our team will be in touch within 24 hours. 
![OpenUnit Management software](https://www.openunit.com/assets/mockups/browser-a5aa4beb06fcfc294e4ab427425cbc4e6b7be954a2029e78fe761306fc9ba758.png)
##  An integrated back office for your facilities and call center. 
OpenUnit is a complete set of tools that gives storage operators the things they need most—a powerful online presence, reservation system, merchant solutions, and management software to simplify running a storage business. 
Loved by the frontline and the boardroom 
##  We’ve designed OpenUnit from the ground up with your customers, your team, and your security in mind. 
Why use legacy software that was built for the way business used to be done? Our fast, intuitive, and modern software is built on a tech stack that provides best-in-class usability, performance, and security right out-of-the-box. 
Manage 
Understand customer data and act on it with pre-built segments like top locations, common tags, and even customer lifetime value. 
Market 
Reach your customers in new ways online, and custom design your online store and checkout experience to match your brand. 
Optimize 
See how your facilities are performing with valuable operational analysis & insights to help understand your tenants. 
Sales 
Accept payments every way your customers want to pay, and increase in-store purchases with Point-of-Sale (POS) software. 
We scale with your business needs 
##  All the tools you need in one OpenUnit account. 
Every OpenUnit account includes a complete set of management tools to ensure you and your team are set up for success. 
##  Customer Relationship Management 
Icons/arrow
###  What's included 
  * Customer relationship management 
  * Price & revenue management tools 
  * Rich customer profiles 
  * Text & email messaging 
  * Digital signatures 
  * Lease agreement templates 


##  Payments & Point of Sale Terminal 
Icons/arrow
###  What's included 
  * Flexible payment methods 
  * PCI compliant 
  * ACH payments 
  * Real-time risk & fraud assessments 
  * Simplified reporting & reconciliation 
  * EMV Level 1, 2, 3 pre-certified card readers 


##  Marketing Website & Search Engine Optimization 
Icons/arrow
###  What's included 
  * Free website hosting & SSL certificate 
  * Online reservations & payments 
  * Omni-channel discounts & promotions 
  * Online Tenant Rental Hub 
  * White label & branding 
  * SEO & PPC management 


##  Team Chat & Employee Management 
Icons/arrow
###  What's included 
  * Real-time group chats 
  * Direct messages (DMs) 
  * Custom to-do's lists 
  * Rental comp collection 
  * Universal search and tagging 


##  Accounting & Bookkeeping 
Icons/arrow
###  What's included 
  * Double-entry bookkeeping 
  * Accrual & cash-basis accounting 
  * Profitability & expense tracking 
  * Extended team accountant provisioning 
  * Reporting dashboard 


##  Enterprise Security 
Icons/arrow
###  What's included 
  * Two-factor authentication 
  * 90-day expiring passwords 
  * Encrypted Personally Identifiable Information (PII) 
  * Compliant document & file storage 
  * Legally-binding digital signatures 
  * Custom roles & team permissions

OpenUnit is the modern, flexible self-storage management solution. We provide storage operators with what they need most—a powerful online presence, reservation & payments system and management tools to efficiently manage their businesses and front-line staff. 
Why OpenUnit

generated_description:
### OpenUnit: Streamlining Self-Storage Management

**Overview:**
OpenUnit, founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's W20 batch, is revolutionizing how self-storage facilities operate. Based in Toronto, Canada, this lean start-up boasts a team of five, offering a comprehensive, all-in-one platform tailored to self-storage businesses—from the small mom-and-pop sites to larger corporate entities.

**Mission:**
The mission of OpenUnit is clear: to provide software solutions that simplify the management of self-storage facilities. By merging multiple functions into a single platform, OpenUnit empowers operators to run their businesses efficiently while enhancing their online presence.

**Core Features:**
1. **Team Management & Communication:** Effortless collaboration with integrated messaging tools. No need for separate apps—communication occurs where the work happens.
2. **Payments & Point-of-Sale:** Flexible payment options increase revenue and facilitate in-store purchases through advanced POS software.
3. **Accounting & Bookkeeping:** With OpenUnit Books, even the least experienced operators can manage sales, cash flow, taxes, and financial reporting with ease.

**What Makes OpenUnit Stand Out?**
- **Integrated Solutions:** Everything is designed to work seamlessly together—from customer relationship management to enterprise-level security.
- **Modern Technology Stack:** Built for today's needs, the software emphasizes usability, performance, and security, ditching the clunky legacy systems of the past.
- **Business Growth Partner:** Whether you have one facility or a hundred, OpenUnit scales effortlessly with your needs, making it a flexible choice for growing businesses.

**Key Offerings:**
- **Management Software:** Comprehensive tools for running daily operations.
- **Enterprise Solutions:** Designed for multi-location or franchise operations.
- **Customer Support:** A dedicated team to help you onboard and optimize your facility management processes.

**Get Started:**
Interested parties can explore the platform further by requesting a free demo on [OpenUnit's website](https://www.openunit.com). With its robust toolset, OpenUnit is not just a software provider; it’s a partner aiding self-storage facilities in thriving in a competitive landscape.

In a nutshell, if you're in the self-storage industry and tired of juggling multiple systems, OpenUnit is a modern solution worth checking out. It’s streamlined, user-friendly, and built with operators in mind. Time to embrace the future of self-storage management.
